summary: Completed testing of Comment Templates feature - Settings > Shabllonet tab and POS receipt preview integration. All backend API tests passed (9/9). Frontend UI tests verified CRUD operations and template display in POS receipt dialog.

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1, -1) - minor cosmetic issue

critical_code_review_comments: Console warning: 'Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent' - accessibility improvement needed for dialogs
seed_data_creation: Test templates created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Comment Templates feature fully implemented and tested. Settings > Shabllonet tab has 'Komentet e Kuponit' section with CRUD operations. POS receipt preview dialog shows templates from backend API. 4 default templates exist in DB: Kthim 14 ditë, Pa Kthim, Garanci 12 muaj, Faleminderit.

backend_api.GET /api/comment-templates: ✓ Returns list of templates with correct structure
backend_api.POST /api/comment-templates: ✓ Creates new template, handles default flag correctly

frontend_ui.Settings > Shabllonet tab: ✓ Shows 'Komentet e Kuponit' section with template list
frontend_ui.Add template: ✓ 'Shto Koment' button opens dialog, form works correctly
frontend_ui.Edit template: ✓ Edit button opens dialog with pre-filled data, saves correctly
frontend_ui.Delete template: ✓ Delete button removes template with confirmation
frontend_ui.Default marker: ✓ Default templates marked with star icon
frontend_ui.POS receipt preview: ✓ Shows templates from backend in 'Shabllonet:' section
